QuestData.Title: Message to Garadar
QuestData.Description: <Lantresor points to an unmarked crate.>$B$BTake it. It is my offering to your people. You have single-handedly saved my clan from extermination.$B$BYou may tell your leader that Lantresor of the Burning Blade and his Boulderfist ogres accept the offering of peace.$B$B<Lantresor bows.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Burning Blade Peace Offering to Garrosh at Garadar.
QuestData.RewardText: <Garrosh kicks the crate aside.>$B$BYou waste your time, $R. Take whatever you desire from the crate. I nor Garadar have any need for these useless trinkets.
